item.title: 特朗普誓言要将其第一任期内发起的贸易战升级。专家表示，这种政策会刺激受到外国商品威胁的行业的就业，但总体结果是，由于整个经济的成本上升，就业机会将进一步减少。
item.description:
Trump has vowed to escalate the trade war initiated in his first term. Such policies would spur employment in industries threatened by foreign goods but the overall result would be further job losses due to a rise in costs across the economy, experts say. https://t.co/q6zC48uJm9 pic.twitter.com/Q2AmHDtln4

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统将于周三上午接受一年一度的体检，这可能是我们在 11 月大选前最后一次了解总统的健康状况。
item.description:
Pres. Biden will undergo his yearly physical Wednesday morning in what could be the final health update we get about the president before the November election. https://t.co/QnpmYeISrn

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 据俄罗斯国有通讯社 RIA Novosti 报道，哈马斯和法塔赫的代表将于周四在俄罗斯首都举行会议，讨论组建统一的巴勒斯坦政府和重建饱受战争蹂躏的加沙地带的问题。
item.description:
Representatives of Hamas and Fatah will meet in Russia’s capital city on Thursday to discuss the formation of a unified Palestinian government and the rebuilding of the war-torn Gaza Strip, according to Russian state-owned news agency RIA Novosti. https://t.co/aFsdMGIgQP

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 最近，人们在南非克鲁格国家公园的一个水潭边发现了一头罕见的白化小象。一家旅行社用相机拍到了这头 "粉红色 "的小象，它和象群一起在水潭里打滚。
item.description:
A rare albino elephant calf was recently spotted playing by a waterhole in South Africa’s Kruger National Park.

A tour operator caught the "pink" calf on camera hanging out with the herd and rolling around in the waterhole. pic.twitter.com/9MHSWZgd9b

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024

item.title: 海洋探险安全：美国广播公司新闻调查发现，自 2016 年海洋探险公司首家水族馆开业以来，至少发生了 75 起人们在不同的海洋探险地点被动物伤害的事件。

item.description:
Idaho's longest-serving death row inmate, 73-year-old serial killer Thomas Eugene Creech, is scheduled to be executed on Wednesday — despite pleas to spare him from the most unlikely advocates.

item.title: 德克萨斯州一名囚犯长期以来一直说自己是无辜的，并声称 20 多年前对他的定罪是基于虚假证词和可疑证据，他因枪杀两人（包括他的表弟）而于周三面临处决。
item.description:

item.title: 当局说，宾夕法尼亚州警方正在寻找一名 23 岁阿米什族孕妇遇害后的线索。当局说，他们正在 "积极调查 "丽贝卡-贝勒（Rebekah Byler）的死因。
item.description:
Police in Pennsylvania are searching for leads after a 23-year-old pregnant Amish woman was killed, authorities said.

item.title: 温迪公司（Wendy's）宣布将推出新的菜单价格，该价格将根据一天中的不同时段而浮动--类似于优步（Uber）和Lyft等共享出行公司采用的激增定价策略。
item.description:
Wendy’s has announced it will launch new menu prices that will fluctuate depending on the time of day — similar to surge pricing strategies adopted by rideshare companies like Uber and Lyft. https://t.co/avOjHNKwe8

— ABC News (@ABC) February 28, 2024
